title: Marshal Law # 1-6 (Epic)
description:
Six issues series by Pat Mills and Kevin O'Neil.
Published by Epic 1987-1988.


We are introduced to MARSHAL LAW, a sanctioned vigilante who hunts superheroes that have gone rogue. He is superhero himself, an ex-army supersoldier who is disillusioned about so called "superheroes". He operates in the city of San Futuro, San Francisco after "The Big One".
